description:
This is great. Starting it may be confusing for beginners though. Just install it, type 'zangband' in your terminal, and it'll run right in there.

Zangband offers LOADS of things to experience, including an open overworld, various towns whcih have their own shops and may have a dungeon stairwell, each town's shops and other buildings all have their own unique things to offer, you can experience the traditional RPG elements such as levelling up, casting magic, and you can even become better in your fighting skills with just your fists. And the easter eggs are fun too.

I personally cannot figure out how to get the game to use graphical mode though sadly. Oh well. Maybe someone else can.

I would HIGHLY recommend this game if you're a fan of roguelikes centered around turn-based dungeon crawling.
summary: This is fantastic for a roguelike!
